name: Guns of Icarus Online\u2014Adventure Mode
blurb: The thrilling team-based airship combat of GoIO expanded with towns, trade, player factions, and a living, breathing, persistent world!

rewards.reward: No Reward

Salute!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Every little bit helps — you have our thanks!
=============================
REWARD NOTES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Game copies are digital and delivered through Steam for PC, Mac, and Linux.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
All backers will get access our Adventure Mode forum for updates, polls, and general discussion.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
All game copies include closed beta access and the Kickstarter exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 costume.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
All backers receiving Collector's Edition copies will get a Thank You in the in-game credits.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Swag can be added to any pledge for $30 per item (your choice of T-shirt, Poster, iPhone Case, Bullet USB Drive, or Cloth Map)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
To play Adventure Mode you MUST own Skirmish Mode as well.
=============================
TIER GROUPS
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ready to Fly, Artifact Collector, Creative Consultant, and Patron
Just Adventure! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Adventure Mode DLC. ATTN: this does not include Dust Rider 2.0. Will include beta and forum access, though.
Back to the Skies Reward\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nAdventure Mode and Dust Rider 2.0 Costume

=============================
READY TO FLY Group
=============================

First Flight (Early Bird)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Adventure Mode + KS Exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 Costume +Collector's Edition (CE) Skirmish Mode (Skirmish Mode soundtrack and Captain's costume pack) + Dust Rider 1.0 costume + Poster + Button. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
First Flight\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nAdventure Mode + KS exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 + CE Skirmish Mode (Skirmish Mode soundtrack, Captain's costume pack) + Dust Rider 1.0 costume

Captain's Certificate (Limited) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Everything in First Flight EB but your poster will be signed by our team!  Adventure Mode + KS Exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 Costume + Collector's Edition (CE) Skirmish Mode (Skirmish Mode soundtrack and Captain's costume pack) + Dust Rider 1.0 costume + Signed Poster + Button. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
Crew United\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\n4x Adventure Mode + 4x KS Exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 Costume
Captain & Crew (Early Bird)\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n4x Adventure Mode + 4x CE Skirmish + 4x KS Exclusive Dust Rider 1.0 + 4x KS Exclusive Dust Rider 2.0

Complete Adventure (Early Bird) \r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nCE Adventure (All CE Adventure content: High-res poster/wallpaper pack, 3 Costume Sets (Costume + Hat + Goggle of your choice), Adventure Soundtrack, Making-Of Documentary) + KS Exclusive Costume Dust Rider 2.0 + CE Skirmish + Dust Rider 1.0 AND Poster + Bullet USB + Button. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

Complete Adventure (Early Bird Redux) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ CE Adventure (All CE Adventure content: High-res poster/wallpaper pack, 3 Costume Sets (Costume + Hat + Goggle of your choice), Adventure Soundtrack, Making-Of Documentary) + KS Exclusive Costume Dust Rider 2.0 + CE Skirmish + Dust Rider 1.0 AND Poster + Bullet USB + Button. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

Complete Adventure\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nCE Adventure (All CE Adventure content: High-res poster/wallpaper pack, 3 Costume Sets (Costume + Hat + Goggle of your choice), Adventure Soundtrack, Making-Of Documentary) + KS Exclusive Costume Dust Rider 2.0 CE Skirmish + Dust Rider 1.0

Captain & Crew\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n4x Adventure Mode + 4x Collector's Edition Skirmish + 4x Kickstarter Exclusive Dust Rider 1.0 Costume + 4x Kickstarter Exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 Costume

============================= 
ARTIFACT COLLECTOR Group
=============================
Bells & Baubles
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Everything in [Complete Adventure] + Thank You Credit, Alpha Tester, and 1x Swag of your choice (T-shirt, Poster, iPhone Case, Bullet USB, or Cloth Map). Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
A Rare Tome\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ \r\nEverything in [Bells & Baubles] + Printed Art Book OR Branded Logbook. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
Expedition Pack\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Bells & Baubles] + Printed Art Book AND Branded Logbook. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

Captain's Banner\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in First Flight: Adventure Mode + KS Exclusive Dust Rider 2.0 Costume + Collector's Edition (CE) Skirmish Mode (Skirmish Mode soundtrack and Captain's costume pack) + Dust Rider 1.0 costume. WITH LIMITED AND SIGNED LARGE FORMAT BANNER. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
The Personal Touch\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Bells & Baubles] + SIGNED Printed Art Book + Branded Logbook. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
Treasure Trove\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Expedition Pack] + All Swag.  Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

Distinguished Collector\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [The Personal Touch] + a UNIQUE ARTIST'S SKETCH in the Branded Logbook + All Swag. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

=============================
CREATIVE CONSULTANT Group
=============================
Nomenclator
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Everything in [Treasure Trove] + work with us to name an in-game item or locale. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
Inventor\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Treasure Trove] + work with us to design an in-game asset. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
Architect\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Treasure Trove] + work with us to name an item or locale AND design an in-game asset. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.
Sculptor\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Treasure Trove] + we'll model an NPC in your likeness. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

Visionary\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything in [Treasure Trove] + name an item or locale, design an asset, AND we'll model an NPC in your likeness. Shipping outside of US subject to $10 surcharge.

=============================
PATRON Group
=============================
Hero of the Burren
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Our heartfelt thanks for your generosity!  You'll get everything in [Distinguished Collector], + help us design an NPC and a premium player costume tailored to your specifications!

Lord/Lady Patron of the Air\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nWe are honored by your generous patronage. In addition to receiving everything in [Hero of the Burren], we'll save a seat for you at our table where the important meetings take place. We'll be waiting for your feedback and give you Developer credit in-game. Feel free to drop by (on your own dime :P )!
